txt_en: May our country prosper and the people live a peaceful life!
txt_cn: 愿祖国繁荣富强，人民安居乐业！

txt_en: The best years of your life are still ahead of you.
Laughter lights up your life.
You deserve all the happiness in the world.
txt_cn: 愿世间所有快乐与你相伴。

txt_en: All you can do is learn from your mistakes.
txt_cn: 你要做的就是从错误里汲取教训。

txt_en: The unknown is there for us to conquer.
txt_cn: 未知等待着我们去征服。

txt_en: Never let your head hang down.
The world needs our open hearts and minds.
txt_cn: 用开放的心态拥抱这个世界。

txt_en: I'm with you every step of the way.
Success is about preparation and planning.
txt_cn: 成功在于做好准备和规划。

txt_en: Everybody deserves to be loved.
A little confidence is always good.
Nothing could ever replace you.
You can't let the past define who you are.
txt_cn: 别用过去来定义你自己。

txt_en: Time heals all wounds.
Love is everywhere.
You learn to appreciate what you have.
Whatever the future brings, you are my light.
txt_cn: 无论未来如何，你永远都是我的光。

txt_en: You have your entire life in front of you. That's something to be thankful for.
txt_cn: 来日方长，要心怀感恩之心。

txt_en: You are in control of your own life.
The shortest answer is doing the thing.
You are everything to me.
Knowledge is the food of the soul.
You're not a nobody.
The future holds limitless possibilities.
You know more than you think you do.
txt_cn: 你远比自己想象的要出色。

txt_en: Habit can provide a strong foundation.
txt_cn: 良好的习惯可以夯实基础。

txt_en: A very small man can cast a very large shadow.
